source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, wide-angle shot of the River Thames in London. The camera remains still, capturing a scenic view of the cityscape, including landmarks like the Shard and the "Walkie Talkie" building. The only movement comes from the gentle flow of the river and a few boats.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: The movement includes the gentle flow of the river, the drifting clouds, a few boats and moving vehicles on the roads and bridge.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video captures not only the gentle flow of the river but also the drifting clouds, a few boats, and moving vehicles on the roads and bridge, adding subtle dynamism to the scene.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video captures not only the gentle flow of the river but also the drifting clouds, a few boats, and moving vehicles on the roads and bridge, adding subtle dynamism to the scene.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is a static, wide-angle shot of the River Thames in London. The camera remains still, capturing a scenic view of the cityscape, including landmarks like the Shard and the "Walkie Talkie" building. The scene is brought to life by the gentle flow of the river, drifting clouds, a few boats, and moving vehicles on the roads and bridge, adding subtle dynamism to the view.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a static, wide-angle shot of the River Thames in London.
